article: The family had just moved. The young woman was feeling a little  _  . It was Mother's Day - and 800 miles separated her from her parents. This satisfied the kids, but not the husband. The next day he  _  some young lilacs around their yard. I was the husband. Now, every May, our yard is full of lilacs. Every Mother's Day our kids  _  purple lilacs. And every year I remember that smile of the lonely old woman. And that has become a lasting touching memory of my life.
